title: Digital Intelligence Dashboard
overview: A unified dashboard for digital lookup and productivity.
description: Built entirely in the browser with zero backend usage, this system provides structured utilities like username checks, email signal analysis, and metadata tools. Demonstrates frontend architecture skills.

title: Micro Tools Suite
overview: Small, fast, browser-based productivity utilities.
description: Includes PDF utilities, text processors, and converters â€” all client-side and privacy-safe. Created to showcase efficient coding and interface clarity.

title: Interactive Tech Sphere
overview: A visual, animated representation of my tech stack.
description: Uses cursor-reactive motion and cosmic aesthetics to create an engaging UI component. Built for performance, responsiveness, and experimental creativity.

title: Automation Workflows
overview: Pipelines connecting N8N, WhatsApp, and Notion.
description: Automates repetitive tasks and improves operational efficiency using API sequencing and logic. Demonstrates system thinking and integration skills.

title: Messaging UI Prototype
overview: Conceptual messaging interface with interaction layouts.
description: Focused on minimal UI structure, layout flow, and clean conversation handling. Built as a design and UX experiment.

title: One-Page Landing Sites
overview: Clean, fast-loading landing pages for various use cases.
description: Modern one-page websites with animations, smooth navigation, and crisp visual hierarchy. Useful for MVPs and client showcases.

title: Vibe Coding Experiments
overview: Creative motion and interaction tests.
description: Explores GSAP animations, parallax scenes, and cosmic UI patterns. Built to refine frontend animation and creative coding skills.

title: Search Enhancement Tools
overview: Utilities for structured online searches.
description: Generates smart queries and formatting suggestions to improve research workflows. Fully ethical and browser-side.

title: NFC Waste Systems (Tech)
overview: Prototype for digital waste tracking using NFC.
description: Focused on system workflow, user interactions, and hardware-integration logic.

title: MoFresh Strategy
overview: Comprehensive business plan for a microgreens startup.
description: Covers market analysis, pricing strategy, branding, and supply chain ideas. Demonstrates real-world business problem-solving.

title: Nuroweli Brand Concept
overview: Brand exploration for wellness-oriented products.
description: Includes brand positioning, strategy frameworks, and design direction. Demonstrates creative strategy.

title: WhatsApp E-Commerce
overview: Minimal e-commerce setup for a handloom store.
description: Product upload system, catalog structure, and basic admin logic optimized for low-tech environments.

title: Sports Performance App
overview: Concept for tracking student sports activity.
description: Early sketches, logic planning, and value proposition breakdown for strategy exploration.

title: NFC Waste System (Biz)
overview: Business concept parallel to the tech prototype.
description: Defined user flow, revenue models, stakeholder mapping, and basic MVP pathways.

title: Prarabdha Ecosystem
overview: End-to-end preschool learning ecosystem design.
description: Includes admin dashboards, teacher/parent apps, habit systems, and gamified learning. My strongest complete product work.

title: FMCG Ad Creativity
overview: Analysis on creativity and consumer response.
description: 6-month academic research involving surveys, analysis, and strategic insights into advertising.

title: EV Customer Behavior
overview: Study of EV customer expectations (Tata & Mahindra).
description: Analyzed patterns and market gaps, used during Mahindra EV internship.

title: Aspirational Districts (ABF)
overview: Government documentation and strategy.
description: KPI dashboards for health & nutrition, education insights, and rural development mapping.

title: Discipline Framework
overview: Personal system for tracking habits.
description: Focused on identity-based habits, consistency, and performance improvement.

title: Fitness System
overview: Structured approach to physical growth.
description: Practical methods for maintaining physical and mental discipline.

title: Life Goals Map
overview: Long-term planning framework.
description: 1-year and 5-year ambitions, skill roadmap, and execution principles.

title: Project Alpha (Abandoned)
overview: First attempt at a social graph engine.
description:
Why it failed: Feature creep and lack of clear database schema planning led to unmaintainable spaghetti code.

Lesson: Plan the data model before writing the API.

title: Crypto Tracker v1
overview: Real-time crypto price dashboard.
description:
Why it failed: Relied on free APIs that had strict rate limits, causing the app to crash under load.

Lesson: Validate API scalability and error handling early.

title: Freelance Marketplace MVP
overview: Platform for local gig workers.
description:
Why it failed: Tried to build for both iOS and Web simultaneously without a team. Burnout struck.

Lesson: Focus on one platform first (MVP).
